entries.journal_entry_description: The Rebel scum has placed antennae around Restuss, to spy on Imperial communications and coordinate their troops. Your orders are to destroy one of these antennae.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've been ordered to destroy one of the Rebel antennas in Restuss. As a Commando, you can either destroy the antenna with your weapons, or place an explosive device on it.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You've successfully destroyed a Rebel antenna and should return to Captain Okto.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: The thermal detonator you attached to the antenna is charging up. Arm it after it's complete.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: The thermal detonator on the antenna is charged up. Flip the switch on it and take cover. You only have 15 seconds before the thermal detonator will be spent.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: You failed to blow up the antenna.
